PageInfo.Message:
Once your Main Pawn has reached a certain
crafting level, they can challenge the <COL
ffdc78>Crafting Level Test</COL>.
By successfully crafting the given <COL
ffdc78>Promotion Test Recipe</COL>, the upper
limit of their craft level will be raised,
allowing them to further enhance their crafting
abilities.

<COL ffdc78>If you don't clear the promotion
exam, your Craft Level will not increase, and
Craft EXP will not be obtained. Please be
careful.</COL>
